Name: Preserve Nippon
Instructions: Gently MUDDLE shisho leaf in base of shaker (just to bruise), add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A vanilla lime cognac sour with Shisho leaf aromatics.
History: Created in 2015 by John Stavroulakis at Zaxari kai Alati Bistrot, Athens, Greece
